snippet.title: Super Mario Land World - Hack of SMW [SNES]
snippet.description:
Hack Created by Lush_50
https://www.smwcentral.net/?p=section&a=details&id=38127
V1.1 - Release date: 2024-07-22

Welcome to SUPER MARIO LAND WORLD!

- **STORY** -

Mario has consumed a Subcon potion and fallen into a deep slumber, where Sarasaland has been invaded by the combined powers of Subcon and the Mushroom Kingdom! Will you save the day or perish in the land of dreams? The fate of the world is in the player's hands.

* Mario has different physics and speed in general, including a higher floating spin jump and altered regular jump.
* Spikes cause instant death.
* There are 13 exits, based on levels from Mario Land GB!
* Start with 10 lives. There are NO SAVES or re-entering levels, just like in Mario Land GB. The only save in the game is at the end of the quest, so every moment counts!
* This game is styled in black, white, and shades of grey.
* Yoshi coins are collectibles that earn you extra lives.
* There are secrets in SOME pipes. Will you find them?
* The hack aims to blend the styles of GB Mario Land, SMW, and All-Stars.

PLAYLISTS:
❖https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLQnnmhmnAahvb9q0dvPIHw5_SAZUV76VP&si=YcSh0S__PDafge6L
❖https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLQnnmhmnAahsfCasrbycBKVFCtFwSV6H0&si=tjqg7hZvoQMdThAj
❖https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLQnnmhmnAahvPc6Y11D37SOetn7NB9Yaf&si=C5rh2iS0TjO_8AG-
❖https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLQnnmhmnAahsaC8g5ANF0Unh_iVpHZ6we&si=9okhIbrr2M3U8l38
❖https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLQnnmhmnAahs9ChiGHkln3L2fnnvHg6_d&si=HmOmdLQ1xZvRr-em
❖https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLQnnmhmnAahtiBbhZTX9Jx25bF9eAri-9&si=g6we425cXXIx9bpN
❖https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLQnnmhmnAahvIbOyUisVEnBDPkiLSOAmr&si=dT-6j2L1wWvZfZEi
❖https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLQnnmhmnAahsk6a9XaFPP8UJb5r-b-w7P&si=lOsdiphbTTEGttlM
❖https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLQnnmhmnAahs_tfuT1ybAPbwBuRSKl-oI&si=UG-hovX_lg_6yXrt
❖https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLQnnmhmnAahuex-3NOF-p_RP8Qdm-vFzA&si=g9AlRCy-gIel1neJ
❖https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLQnnmhmnAahuJU37ckfrc35WBcYv2Gm_S&si=r1by8rc2vztzrFKp

#romhack #supermarioworld #snes
